verses.verse: <WG2532> He entered<WG1525> again<WG3825> into<WG1519> the synagogue,<WG4864> and<WG2532> there was<WG2258> a man<WG444> there<WG1563> who had<WG2192> his hand<WG5495> withered.<WG3583>
<WG2532> They watched<WG3906> him,<WG846> whether<WG1487> he would heal<WG2323> him<WG846> on the Sabbath day,<WG4521> that<WG2443> they might accuse<WG2723> him.<WG846>
<WG2532> He said<WG3004> to the man<WG1519> who had<WG2192> his hand<WG5495> withered,<WG3583> "Stand<WG1453> up.<WG444>"

<WG2532> He said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Is it lawful<WG1832> on the Sabbath day<WG4521> to do good,<WG15> or<WG2228> to do harm?<WG2554> To save<WG4982> a life,<WG5590> or<WG2228> to kill?<WG615>" But<WG1161> they were silent.<WG4623>

<WG2532> When he had looked around<WG4017> at them<WG846> with<WG3326> anger,<WG3709> being grieved<WG4818> at<WG1909> the hardening<WG4457> of<WG2588> their<WG846> hearts,<WG2588> he said<WG3004> to the man,<WG444> "Stretch out<WG1614> your<WG4675> hand.<WG5495>" He stretched<WG1614> it out,<WG1614> and<WG2532> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> was restored<WG600> as<WG5613> healthy<WG5199> as<WG5613> the other.<WG243>

<WG2532> The Pharisees<WG5330> went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> conspired<WG4824> with<WG3326> the Herodians<WG2265> against<WG2596> him,<WG846> how<WG3704> they might destroy<WG622> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> withdrew<WG402> to<WG4314> the sea<WG2281> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> followed<WG190> him<WG846> from<WG575> Galilee,<WG1056> <WG2532> from<WG575> Judea,<WG2449>

<WG2532> from<WG575> Jerusalem,<WG2414> <WG2532> from<WG575> Idumaea,<WG2401> beyond<WG4008> the Jordan,<WG2446> and<WG2532> those<WG3588> from around<WG4012> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon.<WG4605> A great<WG4183> multitude,<WG4128> hearing<WG191> what great things<WG3745> he did,<WG4160> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> He spoke<WG2036> to<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> that<WG2443> a little boat<WG4142> should stay<WG4342> near him<WG846> because of<WG1223> the crowd,<WG3793> so<WG2443> that they wouldn't<WG2346> press on him.<WG846>
For<WG1063> he had healed<WG2323> many,<WG4183> so that<WG5620> as many as<WG3745> had<WG2192> diseases<WG3148> pressed on<WG1968> him<WG846> that they might<WG2443> touch<WG680> him.<WG846>

<WG2532> The unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> whenever<WG3752> they saw<WG2334> him,<WG846> fell down before<WG4363> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> cried,<WG2896> <WG3004> "You<WG4771> are<WG1488> the Son<WG5207> of God!<WG3754>"
<WG2532> He<WG2008> sternly<WG4183> warned<WG2008> them<WG846> that<WG2443> they should<WG5318> not<WG3361> make<WG4160> him<WG846> known.<WG5318>
<WG2532> He went up<WG305> into<WG1519> the mountain,<WG3735> and<WG2532> called<WG4341> to himself those whom<WG3739> he<WG846> wanted,<WG2309> and<WG2532> they went<WG565> to<WG4314> him.<WG846>
<WG2532> He appointed<WG4160> twelve,<WG1427> that<WG2443> they might be<WG5600> with<WG3326> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> that<WG2443> he might send<WG649> them<WG846> out<WG649> to preach,<WG2784>
and<WG2532> to have<WG2192> authority<WG1849> to heal<WG2323> sicknesses<WG3554> and<WG2532> to cast out<WG1544> demons:<WG1140>
<WG2532> Simon,<WG4613> to whom he gave<WG2007> the name<WG3686> Peter;<WG4074>

<WG2532> James<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Zebedee;<WG2199> <WG2532> John,<WG2491> the brother<WG80> of James,<WG2385> and<WG2532> he<WG2007> surnamed<WG3686> them<WG846> Boanerges,<WG993> which<WG3739> means,<WG2076> Sons<WG5207> of Thunder;<WG1027>
<WG2532> Andrew;<WG406> Philip;<WG5376> Bartholomew;<WG918> Matthew;<WG3156> Thomas;<WG2381> James,<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Alphaeus;<WG256> Thaddaeus;<WG2280> Simon<WG4613> the Zealot;<WG2581>
and<WG2532> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot,<WG2469> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> betrayed<WG3860> him.<WG846> He came<WG2064> into<WG1519> a house.<WG3624>
The<WG2532> multitude<WG3793> came together<WG4905> again,<WG3825> so that<WG5620> they<WG846> could<WG1410> not<WG3361> so much as<WG3383> eat<WG5315> bread.<WG740>
When<WG191> his<WG846> friends<WG3844> heard<WG191> it,<WG1831> they went out to seize<WG2902> him:<WG846> for<WG1063> they said,<WG3004> "He is insane.<WG3754>"

The<WG2532> scribes<WG1122> who<WG3588> came down<WG2597> from<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414> said,<WG3004> "He has<WG2192> Beelzebul,<WG954>" and,<WG2532> "By<WG1722> the prince<WG758> of the demons<WG1140> he casts out<WG1544> the demons.<WG3754>"
He summoned<WG4341> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> said<WG3004> to them<WG846> in<WG1722> parables,<WG3850> "How<WG4459> can<WG1410> Satan<WG4567> cast out<WG1544> Satan?<WG4567>
If<WG1437> a kingdom<WG932> is divided<WG3307> against<WG1909> itself,<WG1438> that<WG1565> kingdom<WG932> cannot<WG3756> stand.<WG2476>
If<WG1437> a house<WG3614> is divided<WG3307> against<WG1909> itself,<WG1438> that<WG1565> house<WG3614> cannot<WG3756> stand.<WG2476>
If<WG1487> Satan<WG4567> has risen up<WG450> against<WG1909> himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> is divided,<WG3307> he<WG1410> can't<WG3756> stand,<WG2476> but<WG235> has<WG2192> a end.<WG5056>

But no<WG3756> one<WG3762> can<WG1410> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> of the strong man<WG2478> to plunder,<WG1283> <WG846> <WG4632> unless<WG3361> he<WG1210> first<WG4412> binds<WG1210> the strong man;<WG2478> and<WG2532> then<WG5119> he will plunder<WG1283> his<WG846> house.<WG3614>

Most certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> all<WG3956> sins<WG265> of the descendants<WG5207> of man<WG444> will be forgiven,<WG863> including<WG2532> their blasphemies<WG988> with which<WG3745> they may<WG302> blaspheme<WG987>

but<WG1161> whoever<WG3739> may<WG302> blaspheme<WG987> against<WG1519> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> never<WG1519> has<WG2192> forgiveness,<WG859> but<WG235> is<WG2076> guilty<WG1777> of an eternal<WG166> sin<WG2920>"
<WG3754> â€” because they said,<WG3004> "He has<WG2192> an unclean<WG169> spirit.<WG4151>"

<WG3767> His<WG846> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> his<WG846> brothers<WG80> came,<WG2064> and<WG2532> standing<WG2476> without,<WG1854> they sent<WG649> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> calling<WG5455> him.<WG846>

A multitude<WG3793> was sitting<WG2521> around<WG4012> him,<WG846> and<WG1161> they told<WG2036> him,<WG846> "Behold,<WG2400> your<WG4675> mother,<WG3384> your<WG4675> brothers,<WG80> and<WG2532> your<WG4675> sisters are without<WG1854> looking for you.<WG4571>"
He answered<WG611> them,<WG846> "Who<WG5101> are<WG2076> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384> and<WG2228> my<WG3450> brothers?<WG80>"
Looking<WG4017> around<WG2945> at those who sat<WG2521> around<WG4012> him,<WG846> he said,<WG3004> "Behold,<WG1492> my<WG3450> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> brothers!<WG80>
For<WG1063> whoever<WG302> does<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> the same<WG3778> is<WG2076> my<WG3450> brother,<WG80> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> sister,<WG79> and<WG2532> mother.<WG3384>"
